display_name: Average weekly frequency of mild exercise - Father
description: During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times on the average do you do the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes during your free time: MILD EXERCISE (MINIMAL EFFORT)  (e.g., yoga, archery, fishing from river bank, bowling, horseshoes, golf, snow-mobiling, easy walking)

other.source_name: During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times on the average do you do the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes during your free time: MILD EXERCISE (MINIMAL EFFORT)  (e.g., yoga, archery, fishing from river bank, bowling, horseshoes, golf, snow-mobiling, easy walking)
